name: mm::dma::dma_stream::DmaStream::<D>::sync_impl

mm::mem_obj::HasSize::size.doc: Returns the size of the memory object in bytes.

mm::mem_obj::HasPaddrRange::paddr_range.doc: Returns the physical address range of the memory object.

mm::kspace::paddr_to_vaddr.doc: Convert physical address to virtual address using offset, only available inside `ostd`

arch::mm::sync_dma_range.doc:
# Safety

 The caller must ensure that
  - the virtual address range and DMA direction correspond correctly to a
    DMA region;
  - `can_sync_dma()` is `true`.
